column2: "Na Jesus fiir edzi fii asɔrfi no mu kɔree
column3: na n’esuafo no baa ne nkyɛn bɛkyerɛɛ no asɔrfi no aban no."

column2: "Na obuae see hɔn dɛ
column3: Ana hom nnhu yinom nyina? Nokwar mese hom dɛ
column4: Wonnkegya ɔbo kor a ɔda kor do wɔ ha a wonnkodwuruw egu famu."

column2: "Na ɔko Ngo Bepɔw no do no
column3: n’esuafo baa ne nkyɛn nsumaa mu bɛsee no dɛ
column4: Kyerɛ hɛn aber a yinom bɛyɛ hɔ
column5: na wo mbae nye wiadze ewiei ho asɛnkyerɛdze bɛyɛ dɛn?"

column2: "Na Jesus buae see hɔn dɛ
column3: Hom nhwɛ yie amma obi aanndaadaa hom."

column2: "Na dodowara bɛba wɔ me dzin mu dɛ
column3: Emi nye Kraest no

column2: "Na hom bɛtse ko nye akosɛm nka: hom nhwɛ
column3: mma hom akoma nntu
column4: na otwar dɛ yinom nyina ba

column2: "Na ɔman bɔsoɛr ɔman do
column3: na ahenman bɔsoɛr ahenman do; na ɔkɔm nye asaasewosow bɛba mbeambea."

column2: "Na yinom nyina nye awoko ahyɛse."
"Nna wobeyi hom ama ahohiahia na woeku hom
column3: na amanaman nyina bɛtan hom wɔ me dzin ntsi."

column2: "Ɔno na ɔbɔto dodowara fintsidua
column3: na wobeyiyi hɔnho ama

column2: "Na nkɔnhyɛfo atorfo pii bɔsoɛr na wɔadaadaa dodowara."
"Na osiandɛ emumuyɛ bɔdɔɔ so ntsi
column3: dodowara hɔn dɔ bɛyɛ mberɛw."

column2: "Na nyia obetsim ekodu ewiei no
column3: ɔno na wɔbɛgye no nkwa."

column2: "Na ahenman ho asɛmpa yi
column3: wɔbɛka wɔ wiadze nyina dze edzi amanaman nyina dase; na nkyii ewiei no bɛba."

column2: "Dɛm ntsi sɛ hom hu amambɔe ekyiwadze a Daniel nkɔnhyɛnyi kaa ho asɛm no
column3: dɛ ogyina krɔnkrɔnbea hɔ a (ma nyia ɔrekenkan no ntse ase)"

column2: "ɔno na hɔn a wɔwɔ Judea nguan nkɔ nkokwaa do:"
"mma nyimpa a ɔwɔ dan etsifi nnsian mmbɛfa biribi mmfi ne dan mu;"
"na nyia ɔwɔ haban mu
column3: mma ɔnnsan n’ekyir bio mmbɛfa ne nkatado."

column2: "Na hɔn a wɔafa efur
column3: nye hɔn a wɔma numfo wɔ nda no mu ndue!"

column2: "Na hom nsɔr ma hom eguanguanber no aammba awɔwber mu
column3: anaa ahomgyeda;"

column2: "na aber no ahohiahia kɛse a ofitsi wiadze ahyɛse dze bodu aber no ɔmmba da
column3: eso ɔremmba da

column2: "Na sɛ woenntwa nda no do tsia a
column3: nkyɛ honam biara nnkenya nkwa; na mpamufo ntsi wobotwa nda no do tsia."

column2: "Na aber no sɛ obiara se hom dɛ
column3: Hwɛ

column2: "Na Kraest atorfo nye nkɔnhyɛfo atorfo bɔsoɛr na wɔakyerɛ asɛnkyerɛdze akɛse nye anwanwadze
column3: ma sɛ annhwɛ a mpamufo no mpo wɔbɛdaadaa hɔn."

column2: "Hwɛ
column3: maka akyerɛ hom ansaana edu."

column2: "Dɛm ntsi
column3: sɛ wɔse hom dɛ

column2: "Na dɛ mbrɛ enyinam nyinam fi boka
column3: na ɔhyerɛn kɔ anee no
column4: mbrɛ nyimpa Ba no ne mbae so bɛyɛ ara nye no."

column2: "Na beebiara mbrɛ fun wɔ no
column3: hɔ na mpɛtɛ bɔboaboa hɔn ano."

column2: "Na ntsɛmara
column3: nda no mu ahohia no ekyir no

column2: "na ɔno na nyimpa Ba no n’asɛnkyerɛdze bopue wimu
column3: na wiadze mbusuakuw nyina bɔkɔ ahohia kɛse mu
column4: na wobohu nyimpa Ba no dɛ ɔreba wɔ sor nsuwusiw do
column5: wɔ tumdzi nye enyimnyam kɛse mu."

column2: "Na ɔdze totorobɛnto a ne ndze so bɔsoma n’abɔfoe
column3: ma wɔaabɔboaboa hɔn a wɔapa mu eyi hɔn no ano efi mbrɛ mframa anan no fi ba no
column4: efi sor ano kor akɛpem afa kor so."

column2: "Hom nsua adɔmbadua ho bɛ no: sɛ n’abaw yɛ momon
column3: na oriyi ahaban a
column4: nna hom nyim dɛ ɔhyewber abɛn;"

column2: "dɛmara na hom so sɛ hom hu dɛ yinom nyina yɛ hɔ a
column3: hom nhu dɛ abɛn na edu abowano."

column2: "Nokwar mese hom dɛ
column3: Mbasantsen yi nnkotwa mu akɔ gyedɛ yinom nyina ayɛ hɔ ansaana."

column2: "Ɔsor nye asaase botwa mu akɔ naaso me nsɛm dze
column3: orunntwa mu da."

column2: "Na da no nye dɔn no obiara nnyim: nnyɛ abɔfo a wɔwɔ sor no
column3: nnyɛ Ɔba no so

column2: "Na dɛ mbrɛ Noa nda no yɛe no
column3: mbrɛ nyimpa Ba no ne mbae so bɛyɛ ara nye no."

column2: "Na dɛ mbrɛ nda no a odzi nsuyirii no kan no
column3: wodzidzii
column6: na wɔmaa awar dze kodur da a Noa kɛhyɛɛ hɛn adaka no mu no
column8: "na woennhu araa dze kodur dɛ nsuyirii no bae bɛfaa hɔn nyinara kɔree no
column9: mbrɛ nyimpa Ba no ne mbae so bɛyɛ ara nye no."

column2: "Ɔno na nyimpa beenu wɔ haban mu a
column3: wɔbɛfa baako na woegya kor no."

column2: "Mbaa beenu bɛyam wɔ ewuyambo do
column3: na wɔbɛfa baako na woegya kor no."

column2: "Dɛm ntsi hom nweɔn
column3: osiandɛ hom nnyim dɔn kor a hom wura bɛba."

column2: "Na hom nhu yi dɛ
column3: sɛ ofiwura no nyim dasu kor a owifo no bɛba a
column5: na ɔamma woemmbobubu ne dan mu annkɔ mu."

column2: "Dɛm ntsi hom so hom nyɛ krado
column3: osiandɛ dɔn a hom enyi nnda mu na nyimpa Ba no reba."

column2: "Afei woana nye akowaa nokwafo nye nyansafo a no wura dze no esi ne fikuw do
column3: dɛ ɔmma hɔn edziban wɔ ber a ɔsɛ mu?"

column2: "Nhyira aka akowaa no a
column3: sɛ no wura ba a
column6: "Nokwar mese hom dɛ ɔdze no besi n’adze a ɔwɔ nyina do."

column2: "Na sɛ akowaa bɔn se n’akoma mu dɛ
column3: Mo wura rikyim ne ba;"

column2: "na sɛ ɔhyɛ ase bobɔ no nwurankowaa
column3: na sɛ ɔnye asabokwafo dzidzi na ɔnom a
column5: "akowaa no wura bɛba da a ɔnnhwɛ no kwan
column9: na ɔama ɔnye ndabrabafo edzi afora; hɔ na osu nye asetwɛr wɔ."
